snippet: The Toronto Raptors, who have excelled since trading Rudy Gay, play an Indiana Pacers team integrating a former star, Danny Granger, into the lineup.
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Raptors, who have excelled since trading Rudy Gay, play an Indiana Pacers team integrating a former star, Danny Granger, into the lineup.

headline.main: N.B.A. Game of the Week: A Rising Team Faces a Top One
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Game of the Week: A Rising Team Faces a Top One
